subtitle: GOT QUESTIONS?
title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Find answers to common questions about our services, process, and more.
question1: Do you work on command only?
answer1: Yes, we work exclusively on command. This allows us to create furniture that perfectly matches your space, style, and requirements. We don't maintain a large inventory, which means every piece is made specifically for you.
question2: How long does it take to complete a custom furniture piece?
answer2: The timeline varies depending on the complexity and size of the project. Typically, a custom piece takes 2-6 weeks from design approval to completion. We'll provide you with a detailed timeline during our consultation.
answer3: We use premium quality materials including solid wood, high-grade plywood, quality hardware, and finishes. We source materials from trusted suppliers and can discuss material options based on your preferences and budget.
question4: Can I see examples of your previous work?
answer4: Absolutely! Visit our shop page to see our completed projects. We're proud of our work and happy to share references from satisfied clients.
answer5: Yes, we provide design consultation as part of our service. We'll work with you to understand your vision, space requirements, and style preferences to create furniture that perfectly fits your needs.
answer6: We're based in Bepanda, Douala, Cameroon, and serve clients throughout Douala and surrounding areas. For larger projects, we can discuss delivery options to other regions in Cameroon.
